00218     template<class Archive>
00219     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00220     {
00221         // If Archive is an output archive, then '&' resolves to '<<'
00222         // If Archive is an input archive, then '&' resolves to '>>'
00223         archive & mDurationOfSimulation;
00224         archive & mTotalTimeStepsInSimulation;
